name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Entrenchment
name_original: Sins of a Solar Empire: Entrenchment
description:
Sins of a Solar Empire: Entrenchment is a game developed by Ironclad Games. It was originally released in 2009. Stardock Entertainment published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Sins of a Solar Empire: Entrenchment is available on PC.
Paul Schuegraf scored the game.
